scripts.build-js: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public_html/assets/js/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public_html/assets/js/ && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.min.js public_html/assets/js/
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run build-fa-webfonts
